Tucson quickly turns on his heel, in the direction of Rodimus's voice.

"RO=
DIMUS! DON'T WORRY, I'M HERE! I'LL FIND YOU!"

He begins to run in the dire=
ction of the sound of Rodimus's voice.  But he also knew that the buildings=
 could create an impressive echo which could displace his comrade's voice, =
making it appear that he may be somewhere other than the direction he was h=
eading. Almost immediately, he closes his eyes for a moment, to allow his s=
onar to kick in.  That would give him an accurate heading as to where to go=
. He attempts to locate Rodimus's signature and bounce the wave off of it, =
and back to him.

" I've already lost him twice, I will NOT lose him a thir=
d time!"  

He narrows his eyes, and in a running start he transforms into =
truck mode, and rolls his tires swiftly over the ground,kicking up dust ben=
eath them.  He was adament about reaching Rodimus and was not about to let =
anything get in his way.

"Rodimus, if you can hear me, keep talking to me.=
  If we keep in touch with each other it will be easier to  be reunited.  W=
here are you? And what direction are you headed?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroup=

and

 techological or biological, Tuscon appeared to be totally alone.

pty streets greeted his sight as breezes blew around small bits

p
